title: [1.6.4-1.8][SSP/SMP]平坦的基岩层——还在烦恼杂乱无章的基岩?[InfStudio]
author: mcjava
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mcjava 于 2015-6-27 18:03 编辑 

(本Mod版权归原作者所有)
简介




本Mod是国外的一个大触开发的。这位作者考虑到了玩家们在游戏中常常被杂乱无章的基岩层所烦恼，例如：无法挖掘夹在基岩之间的矿物、在低处挖矿时常常会被基岩拦路更改了游戏的基岩生成系统，使其变得只有0层这一薄薄的一层，从而使基岩层变得平坦


图片





2015-06-27_17.19.46.png (321.01 KB, 下载次数: 165)

2015-6-27 17:58 上传








2015-06-27_17.19.49.png (339.49 KB, 下载次数: 168)

下载附件

2015-6-27 17:58 上传














特点
用填充块替换基岩
在平坦世界中无影响




问题和请求
对于错误报告或要求，请使用Ticket Overview
请确保您使用的Mod为你的Minecraft版本的最新版
源代码提供于GitHub上
(以上问题与我无关，请自己到原帖联系作者)





更新日志(未汉化)
1.6.4






1.0.10.75
No ClientSide requirement1.0.9.72
Fixed: Nether ceiling - Thanks impiaaa1.0.8.70
Version derp1.0.7.69
Fixed: Issue with CustomSpawn1.0.6.66
Fixed: Issues with Mariculture (Awesome Mod)
Fixed: Performance Issues (thx mDiyo, skyboy, pillbox)
Reworked: Mod Detection Twilight Forest, GalactiCraft and MineDonalds
Removed: Lava Support1.0.5.53
Fixed: Little code issues/formatings
Added: Config Option for compatibility with Project Red1.0.4.46
Added: MineDonalds Support - Requested by iLexiconn (Author)
Added: Old World Support / Retro Generation - Idea by Faelinor
-> For more details please read the command description.1.0.3.34
Fixed Server related bug, thanks naxmer for reporting this ugly thingy1.0.2.30
Added support for The Twilight Forest Dimension (configurable)
No interference of the dungeon generation
Added support for Galacticraft Dimensions (Moon, Mars) (configurable)






Autodetection for the default filler block
1.0.1.23
Fixed generation time for SmoothBedrock
Added Redstone as filler block for Bedrock (Chance 0.0002%)
Added Lapis as filler block for Bedrock (Chance 0.0005%)
Changed Chance for Lava from 10% to 5%1.0.0.17
Initial release for MineCraft 1.6.2 and 1.6.4
Configurable settings
Configurable replacement for Bedrock (Default: Stone)
Configurable use when generating the Nether

1.7.2

2.0.11.77
First release for 1.7.2
Only Smooth Bedrock, no retrogen, no command, no dimension support.
